betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7Slay the primordial malevolence. The Shockwave Sword is the best weapon to damage it!

§fAn abyssal one! I found it!
The primordial malevolence recognized me, it called me by name...
It was this creature that gave me the ability to open wormholes, but it appeared very surprised about my independence. 
"How can you act on your own?" it said, "He told me to give you power as a sacrifice, you should be in His grasp! The others gave you undeath, I gave you travel, and we were promised the Arbiter! Why are you free?"
Why am I free? Because there is more to be learned in this universe, and I will not let this lovecraftian horror hold me back!
This 'He' does worry me, though. It appears I was simply the bargaining chip for some sort of deal between abyssal creatures. At least I know I'm not the one that made a pact with the devil.
And what the hell is this Arbiter?
